markdownRemark.html:
Project SHASTRA is directed at research in CSCW (Computer Supported Cooperative Work) based geometric modeling, simulation, interrogative visualization and design prototyping environments. The implementation is on the multimedia desktop and harnesses the power of networked workstations.

PROJECTS & ACTIVITIES

Collaborative Design, Simulation & Prototyping

Distributed and Collaborative Synthetic Environments

3D Sound Processing

Synthetic Environments:

  • Air/Land/Sea Defense
  • Human Body Walk-through
  • Molecular World
  • Networked Learning Spaces
  • Economic Visualization

Interrogative Data Visualization

Collaboration on the Internet

TOOLKITS & SOFTWARE

Bhautik
Ganith
Gati
Rasayan
Shilp
Splinex
Vaidak

MULTIMEDIA SERVICES

SPONSORS
